```{r}
ggplot(DendroMerge, aes(x = PithHand, y = `Diameter (CM)`)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth( method = "lm", se = FALSE)+
  scale_y_continuous(
    limits = c(0,100)
  ) +
scale_x_continuous(
  limits = c(1985,2020)
)
```


```{r}
model <- lm(DendroMerge$`Diameter (CM)` ~ DendroMerge$PithHand, data = DendroMerge)
summary(model)

```
